H0.text: Who painted Girl with a Pearl Earring. Rembrandt van Rijn

H1.text: Who painted Girl with a Pearl Earring. Frans Hals

H2.text: Who painted Girl with a Pearl Earring. Carel Fabritius

H3.text: Who painted Girl with a Pearl Earring. Vermeer

A4.text: Tracy Chevalier's novel Girl with a Pearl Earring (1999) and the 2003 film of the same name present a fictional account of Vermeer's creation of the famous painting and his relationship with the equally fictional model.
